mapper.select: select e.FactoryName,e.EStationName,m.EMeterName from Estations e left JOIN EMeters m on m.EStationID = e.EStationID where e.FactoryName!="未确定" and m.Online=1 and m.EMeterName!=""
select s.ErtuLocation,s.ErtuName,m.EMeterName from Ertus s LEFT JOIN EMeters m on m.ErtuID=s.ErtuID where s.ErtuName!="未确定"

select id,userName,IP,date_format(CreatedDateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as CreatedDateTime from Record where userName like CONCAT('%',#{parameter},'%') or IP like CONCAT('%',#{parameter},'%') ORDER BY CreatedDateTime desc
select IP,CreatedDateTime from Record where userName = #{geNumber} and (select MAX(CreatedDateTime) FROM record) >= CreatedDateTime ORDER by CreatedDateTime desc LIMIT 1
select date_format(CreatedDateTime,"%m-%d") name , count(id) value from Record where CreatedDateTime > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 6 DAY) group by name ORDER BY name LIMIT 7
